description:
Crafter.js is a frontend library for creating interactive websites using webcomponents, models, traditional dom manip, databinding and webcomponents.

it offers :
* routing
* custom elements
* custom attributes
* script/style loader
* simplified websocket wrapper
* data-binding and observables
* awesome and easy event handling
* rich dom manipulation system
* react like element creation
* observe and react to dom changes

Feel free to fork and contribute
name: Crafter.js
